description:
Hagiwara Sakura has been voted center vocalist of Sweet Diva four years running, but when she and friend and rival idol Miyazawa Elena get sent on TV gig to learn some pro wrestling moves a heated conversations with a pro wrestler leads to a full-body confrontation. Sakura loses her first real fight, but vows to return to the ring again as a pro and defeat her new rival, Kazama Rio.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: アイドルレスラー誕生!
